forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 58, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. Southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. West wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
